description.zh-CN: 多功能列表視圖組件，用於以可滾動列表格式顯示結構化數據。支持項目選擇、篩選、排序功能和可自定義的項目模板，以實現靈活的數據呈現和用戶交互。
description.en-US: A versatile list view component for displaying structured data in scrollable list format. Features item selection, filtering, sorting capabilities, and customizable item templates for flexible data presentation and user interaction.

description.zh-CN: 极简风格風格的列表视图實現
description.en-US: A functional list view implementation featuring clear item separation, efficient scrolling, responsive interaction feedback, and smooth animations. Provides effective data visualization and navigation for browsing list content efficiently with intuitive controls.

description.zh-CN: Material Design風格的列表视图實現
description.en-US: List View implementation in Material Design style
List View implementation in Bootstrap 5 style

description.zh-CN: 拟态风格風格的列表视图實現
description.en-US: List View implementation in Neumorphism style

description.zh-CN: 玻璃拟态風格的列表视图實現
description.en-US: List View implementation in Glassmorphism style
